DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 60 year old Following structure telephone interview , participant follow condition able participate : 1. current smoker 2. active , uncontrolled medical disorder 3. chronic infection ( e.g. , Hepatitis C , HIV ) 4. use certain medication ( e.g. , hypnotic psychotropic medication , steroid use , opioid use ) 5. psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , current major depression , bipolar disorder ) 6. body mass index ( BMI ) great 35 Other exclusion criterion may apply .
